description: This file defines a mock class 'ServiceMock' that implements the 'WPEFramework::PluginHost::IShell' interface, used for unit testing or mocking the behavior of service components in the project.
external_methods: GMock interface map macros: BEGIN_INTERFACE_MAP, INTERFACE_ENTRY, END_INTERFACE_MAP

classes.name: ServiceMock
classes.description: A mock class for the 'IShell' interface providing mocked implementations for its methods, used in testing.

methods.name: Resumed
methods.description: Indicates if the service has resumed.

methods.name: IsSupported
methods.description: Checks if a feature is supported given a uint8_t parameter.

methods.name: EnableWebServer
methods.description: Enables the web server with given parameters.

methods.name: Submit
methods.description: Submits a request given an ID and JSON element.

methods.name: Notify
methods.description: Sends a notification with topic and message.

methods.name: QueryInterfaceByCallsign
methods.description: Queries an interface by call sign.

methods.name: Activate
methods.description: Activates the service with a reason.

methods.name: Deactivate
methods.description: Deactivates the service with a reason.

methods.name: Unavailable
methods.description: Marks the service as unavailable with a reason.

methods.name: ConfigLine (overloaded)
methods.description: Returns configuration line for a specific string.

methods.name: Hibernate
methods.description: Hibernates the service with a reason.

methods.name: GetLibrarySearchPaths
methods.description: Returns an iterator over library search paths.
